title: How to Beat No. 7 of Mushroom XIII in Kingdom Hearts II

steps.title: Go to Twilight Town.
steps.content: Go to Twilight Town. Land at Sunset Terrace.

steps.title: Head down the stairs.
steps.content: Head down the stairs. Then follow the train tracks until you see the man wearing a green shirt.

steps.title: Go through the entryway.
steps.content: Go through the entryway. You'll see a large entryway with "1" written above it - this is the one to go through.

steps.title: Follow the arrows that point to "2."
steps.content: Follow the arrows that point to "2." When you arrive at the entryway no. 2, look left and you'll see the mushroom.

steps.title: Place Thundaga on your shortcut menu.
steps.content: Place Thundaga on your shortcut menu. This will be the only attack you need. Since you can't attack the mushroom, spam Thundaga on it!

steps.title: Place some ethers on your shortcut menu.
steps.content: Place some ethers on your shortcut menu. This is in case you run out of MP before the mushroom dies.

steps.title: Equip Photon Debugger.
steps.content: Equip Photon Debugger. This is for added damage to thunder-based magic.

steps.title: Equip Fatal Crest (Final form).
steps.content: Equip Fatal Crest (Final form). This is for added magic boost. This keyblade is even stronger than Ultima Weapon in terms of magic damage.

steps.title: Drive into Final form.
steps.content: Drive into Final form. Press âˆ† to start the challenge.

steps.title: Jump and glide away as soon as start.
steps.content: Jump and glide away as soon as start. This will keep you from getting hit as soon as the challenge starts.

steps.title: Circle around the area and spam Thundaga.
steps.content: Circle around the area and spam Thundaga. Be careful when circling around; the area is pretty small, and you might hit a wall and get attacked by the mushroom.

steps.title: Use aerial recovery if you get hit by the mushroom.
steps.content: Use aerial recovery if you get hit by the mushroom.

steps.title: Continue casting Thundaga.
steps.content: Continue casting Thundaga. The mushroom should die within 5 seconds.
